description: The Anbu Chief of Konohagakure`s Yamanaka clan. Prior to this, he was a Root member. As per standard Root training, Sai was conditioned to remove all emotions and as such, had difficulty connecting with others. When he is added to Team Kakashi as a replacement for the rogue Uchiha Sasuke, Sai begins to learn more about people`s feelings and tries to develop his personality and identity by forming genuine bonds and rediscovering the emotions he was taught to suppress.
name: Yamanaka Sai
